ISSUE.TITLE: Incorrect formatting for strings in NopCommonDefaults.cs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Incorrect formatting for SingleFaviconHeadLink, FaviconAndAppIconsPath and LocalePatternPath. May result failing HTML verification if single favicon.ico is uploaded. The path is formatted with backslashes (\\) instead of common slash (/) Steps to reproduce the problem: In file "Nop.Services/Common/NopCommonDefaults.cs" In current version: ``` public static string SingleFaviconHeadLink => "<link rel=\"shortcut icon\" href=\"\\icons\\icons_{0}\\{1}\">"; public static string FaviconAndAppIconsPath => "icons\\icons_{0}"; public static string LocalePatternPath => "lib\\cldr-data\\main\\{0}"; ``` Should be: ``` public static string SingleFaviconHeadLink => "<link rel=\"shortcut icon\" href=\"/icons/icons_{0}/{1}\">"; public static string FaviconAndAppIconsPath => "icons/icons_{0}"; public static string LocalePatternPath => "lib/cldr-data/main/{0}"; ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5189 from badijm/5178-NopCommonDefaults #5178 Fix of: Incorrect formatting for strings in NopCommonDefaults.cs
